nodes.text: F3-T2 was an astromech droid that served the Galactic Republic aboard Carrick Station during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire.

F3-T2 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the Republic Flashpoint courier for the Assault on Tython Flashpoint, though the droid is only found aboard Carrick Station and not on other planets like other couriers.
